meanings.definition: The flat, movable bone at the front of the knee joint.
meanings.sent1: She fell and hurt her kneepan.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his kneepan carefully.
meanings.sent3: The kneepan decided to take a break from all the bending.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, hitting his kneepan.
meanings.sent5: The kneepan, like a shield, protected his knee during the fall.

meanings.definition: To hit someone on the kneepan.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally kneepanned his friend during the game.
meanings.sent2: She kneepans gently to get attention.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten kneepanned the toy mouse across the room.
meanings.sent4: His words kneepanned her emotions, leaving her stunned.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's joke kneepanned the audience into fits of laughter.
